message.content:
Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with fresh berries, banana, and a splash of coconut milk.
Snack: Apple slices with peanut butter.
Lunch: Quinoa salad with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and roasted sweet potatoes.
Dinner: Baked chicken breast with steamed broccoli and brown rice.

Day 2:
Breakfast: Avocado toast on whole grain bread topped with sliced tomato, black pepper, and a squeeze of lemon.
Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus.
Lunch: Grilled shrimp salad with mixed greens, bell peppers, and balsamic vinaigrette.
Dinner: Roasted vegetable stir-fry (e.g., zucchini, mushrooms, onions) over quinoa.

Day 3:
Breakfast: Chia seed pudding with mixed berries and a drizzle of maple syrup.
Snack: Rice cakes with mashed avocado and sliced tomato.
Lunch: Lentil soup with crusty whole grain bread.
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted asparagus and sweet potato fries.

Day 4:
Breakfast: Green smoothie made with spinach, banana, almond milk, and a scoop of protein powder.
Snack: Sliced cucumber with guacamole.
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and lemon vinaigrette dressing.
Dinner: Stuffed bell peppers (e.g., quinoa, black beans, and salsa) topped with cheese if you're not allergic.

Day 5:
Breakfast: Scrambled egg whites with sautéed spinach and whole wheat toast.
Snack: Sliced pear with tahini.
Lunch: Tuna salad (without honey mustard) stuffed in a bell pepper or served on mixed greens.
Dinner: Grilled chicken with roasted Brussels sprouts and baked sweet potato fries.

Day 6:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt (dairy-free option: soy, coconut, or almond milk-based yogurt) topped with berries and a dash of cinnamon.
Snack: Celery sticks with sunflower seed butter.
Lunch: Quinoa salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and lemon vinaigrette dressing.
Dinner: Lemon garlic shrimp skewers with steamed broccoli and brown rice.

Day 7:
Breakfast: Vegan smoothie bowl made with frozen bananas, almond milk, and topped with granola, chia seeds, and fresh berries.
Snack: Apple slices with sunflower seed butter.
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and honey-mustard dressing (but use a garlic alternative).
Dinner: Stir-fried tofu with mixed vegetables and brown rice.

Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day. You can also add herbs like basil, cilantro, or parsley for extra flavor if desired.
